bill.summary:
COVID-19 Behavioral Health Support Act
This bill requires the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration to award grants to states, tribes, local governments, behavioral health and primary care providers, and community organizations to support behavioral health treatment and services during the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) pandemic.
